Enable quick shop

settings.label: Enable additional checkout buttons
settings.info: The buttons can appear on either your cart page or your checkout page, but not both.

settings.label: Enable terms and conditions checkbox
settings.info: This feature exists on the cart page and not in the sticky cart. Select the 'Page' cart type if this is a requirement.
